sources.title: Going Spanish
sources.description: Bob Hope, his fiancée (Vicki Cummings) and prospective mother-in-law (Frances Halliday) pass through Los Pochos Eggos, South America. In which, on a certain day, you can do or say anything to anyone, as long as you sing a song to them afterwards But both Bob and the girl find new flames, a problem they may not be able to sing out of.

metadata.Plot: Bob, his fiancée and prospective mother-in-law pass through Los Pochos Eggos, South America during a festival when you can get out of any trouble by singing. But both Bob and the girl find new flames, a problem they may not be able to sing out of.
metadata.Actors: Bob Hope, Leah Ray, Frances Halliday
